pages.text: When a human with vampire blood in their system dies, they will revive into a state of transition. During this state, the player will have fifteen minutes to choose whether or not they wish to die (for real) or become a vampire.

pages.title: The Choice
pages.text: If you wish to become a vampire, you must drink the blood of any creature ($(k:maleficium.suck_blood)). Upon doing so, you will be fully transformed into a vampire. If you do not drink blood within the fifteen minute period, you will die.
